website_summaries.verdict: A large sized counter-top microwave that is powerful enough to cook for a whole family.
pros: Large enough to handle a casserole dish
Can defrost larger items like a turkey breast
Includes a digital clock and timer
10 power levels and several quick cook buttons
cons: This is a countertop microwave and does not include a vent for an under-mount above an oven

customer_reviews.title: A perfectly respectable microwave
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is ok. The first one turned on automatically whenever you closed the door so that went back but thanks to the amazing service of Amazon we had another on our step within 24 hours. It is spacious, not too bad looking, and does the job. What I find annoying is that the big buttons on this thing are for "soften" and "melt" which seems ridiculous. Why is it not "start"? On every microwave I've ever had, "start" was the big main button. But other than having a bit of a mess when it comes to keypad layout, it does the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi H

customer_reviews.title: Durable, pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very nice microwave. Works as intended. Came with a lot of Styrofoam packaging in original box with instruction manual. Larger than I expected but fits perfectly on my counter. Seems like it will last a long time. Nice black shiny color with silver metal accents. Much better than my old plastic gray one.
customer_reviews.author: Kimono5454

customer_reviews.title: Lemon
customer_reviews.text: The door did not open, the button opening the door is malfunctioning. I did not install the product until more than one month after the purchase so missed the return window. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kikina C.

customer_reviews.title: This microwave lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this microwave on Nov. 28, 2019 and it is now Sep. 5, 2020 and my husband just heated a glass of water for 8 minutes and it was still at the temp it came out of the tap. For the price it's not very big, and it's obviously not at all quality. Save your money and find a better model.
customer_reviews.author: pikaomega

customer_reviews.title: Control Pannel Start Button Area Delaminating
customer_reviews.text: It does heat up food in volume. It is fast and quiet. I am having a problem with the area on the control panel where the start button is located. Delaminating from the underlying surface is being observed. It is only 60 days old with less than 200 use cycles. This should not be happening. If this was defect was not occurring I would give it 2 more stars at this time.
customer_reviews.author: joel mellon

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off while cooking. No support to fix it or replace.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps shutting off even when there is still time on it to cook. Have to stay and watch it so it cooks completely. Contacted the company through Amazon and haven't heard anything back. When it does work, it's great, but needing to stay beside it makes it a hassle to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and works fantastic! Would encourage others to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This Westinghouse quality product is an excellent value, and meets all of my expectations. What else in life can beat that? Therefore, please consider buying one if you need one!
customer_reviews.author: RJ. Coupe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works well I've had it for about a year with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Best and ONLY 5 star microwave oven on the market period.
customer_reviews.text: This is our "go to" device in the kitchen. It is used many times a day and has had zero problems. It is very easy to clean and the turn table handles even 5 quart Carmel batches with ease. For those who do not like the 5 beeps when it is done, just hit the cancel button and the beeps stop immediately. We could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gould

customer_reviews.title: It is worth every penny. I have had it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is worth every penny. I have had it for a month and use it daily. It reheats evenly. 20 ounce mug of water boils in 2 minutes. And it stays hot much longer than microwaved water normally does. Did I mention how quiet it is? It's very quiet. It's large enough for my 9 X 12 glass lasagne pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer #1

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2yrs and 2 month
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after 2yrs and 2 months. It just will not turn on no matter what. Before this, it was a great microwave, but not we are left without one. Our previous one lasted 10 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well! (For a little while)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my parents. They enjoy it and say that both the popcorn and potato buttons work well. Edited to add that this lasted just over 9 months before it completely stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Solution
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars if plastic coating on control buttons lasted more than a month.
customer_reviews.author: TomT

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this oven right before Christmas. I loved the way it looked,and the inside dimensions. Used it until yesterday when it just stopped working. Too late to send it back. Because we are senior citizens, cannot afford another oven now. What a disappointment and waste of money-3 months for a $275.00 microwave!! Now what do I do?
customer_reviews.author: connie heide

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: plastic over the key pad does not last very long
customer_reviews.author: djp

customer_reviews.title: and it arrived in terrible condition! The box looked like it had been ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this microwave as an open-box item, and it arrived in terrible condition! The box looked like it had been around the world several times, and the inside packing was all broken. To make matters worse, the microwave did not even work. It made a loud buzzing noise when turned on and didn't heat anything. We had to try and re-package it and send it back. We ordered another in hopes that this particular item was just a fluke, but I'm apprehensive that the replacement will work either. It would be nice if Amazon actually tested returned items before sending out to a new customer! I was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Holder

customer_reviews.title: Look and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Westinghouse is a brand name that I know I can trust. The 1200 Watt Westinghouse microwave fits my needs perfectly. It is the perfect size for my counter and fits easily under the cabinets. It is more powerful than my 18 year old microwave which up and died.The large cooking area is great for big servings. It even has a child proof lock on the door. The front is stainless steel and the sides are black which matches my dishwasher. The power buttons are easy to read and there are six menus buttons for Popcorn, Potato, Pizza, Beverage, Frozen Entree and Soup. I am really enjoying my new microwave oven and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Plastic peeling
customer_reviews.text: Large, microwave that works very well. Very nice overall look, However; the clear plastic covering the numbers is already peeling! We have only been using it for a couple months now. I am so disappointed, especially for the cost of the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Erin W.

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and it works great, the only thing I have noticed is that the plastic over the start button is starting to peel apart and we haven't had it that long
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are not illuminated and that suckz for midnight munchies
customer_reviews.text: Buttons are not illuminated, that's major suckage and a deal breaker but........ Inexpensive and delivered to my door and placed on the threshold, can't beat that for convenience. Was packaged very well and unit has plenty of power and cooks nice and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: BeerFisher

customer_reviews.title: I hate this microwave
customer_reviews.text: I hate this microwave! It beeps for no reason, tells you the door is not closed when it clearly is,and of course it all started after I threw away the box and had it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE LONG

product_meta.title: Westinghouse WCM16100SS 1000 Watt Counter Top Microwave Oven, 1.6 Cubic Feet, Stainless Steel Front, Black Cabinet
product_meta.description: Style Name:1.6 Cu Ft.When you buy Westinghouse you know you're buying quality. With the WCM16100SS microwave oven you’re getting 1000 watts of cooking power and a spacious 1.6 cubic feet on the inside and an attractive stainless steel front panel on the outside. The easy-to-read LED display is equipped with both clock and timer options, making it easy to keep track of when your food will be ready. With 10 cooking power levels and 6 one-touch quick cook menu buttons you can prepare just about any food worry free. There is also the option of auto weight or speed defrost, both capable of executing that very important cooking function to perfection. You’ll fully appreciate this microwave each and every time you’re hosting that large gathering of family and friends.
feature_bullets: Spacious 1.6 cubic foot interior – great when preparing for gatherings of family and friends
Easy-to-read green LED display that includes digital clock and timer
10 cooking power levels provide tremendous flexibility and help deliver a quality meal every time
Six one-touch quick cook menu buttons: Popcorn, Potato, Pizza, Beverage, Frozen Food, Reheat
Convenient auto weight or speed defrost option makes you feel like a professional chef in your kitchen
Peace of mind child safety lock

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
